Investasi Bodong Qnet Sudah Dihentikan, Kok Masih Kecolongan?
07 Nov 2019, 05:03 by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Foto: Alfons/detikcom

Jakarta - Pihak kepolisian sudah menetapkan 12 orang tersangka terkait investasi Qnet. Modus yang digunakan oleh Qnet untuk menjaring korban adalah iming-iming bonus yang besar jika menjadi anggota.Ketua Satgas Waspada Investasi Tongam L Tobing mengungkapkan sebelumnya Satgas sudah menghentikan kegiatan pemasaran yang dilakukan oleh PT Amoeba Internasional ini. "Kami juga sudah memanggil pihak Qnet pada rapat satgas November ini untuk memonitor tindak lanjut penghentian kegiatan tersebut," kata Tongam saat dihubungi detikcom, Kamis (7/11/2019).Dia menjelaskan, meskipun sudah dihentikan masih ada kegiatan Qnet karena sebenarnya kegiatannya legal karena ada SIUPL, sehingga produk bisa dipasarkan dengan sistem MLM. "Namun kegiatan tersebut diduga melanggar ketentuan dan kode etik yang ada," jelas dia.Sebelumnya pihak kepolisian dari Tim Cobra Satreskrim Polres Lumajang telah menggeledah kantor PT Amoeba Internasional di Kediri, Jawa Timur dan QN Internasional Indonesia di Jakarta. QNII merupakan pemegang merek Qnet Indonesia. Dari hasil pemeriksaan kepolisian QNII tidak memiliki kontrak hak distribusi eksklusif dari pemilik merek. Padahal seharusnya perusahaan MLM tidak boleh mengedarkan produk yang tidak punya kontrak distribusi eksklusif dari pemilik merek. Selain itu pemasaran PT QNII juga tidak terdaftar di Kementerian Perdagangan. QNII menjalankan sistem distribusi dengan model matahari yakni setiap member boleh memiliki ratusan bahkan ribuan downliner serta tidak ada pembatasan sama sekali sehingga membentuk matahari. Namun nyatanya, QNII menjalankan sistem binary yakni setiap anggota hanya diizinkan memiliki 2 downliner yakni 1 di kaki kanan dan 1 di kaki kiri. Hal ini disebut mengelabui hukum, karena apa yang dilaporkan berbeda dengan implementasi di lapangan. Disebutkan pula, korban mulai berjatuhan mulai dari menjual sawah, sapi hingga utang ke bank agar member bisa mendapatkan bonus yang berlipat ganda. Qnet's False Investment Has Been Stopped, How come It's Still Lost?
Nov 7, 2019, 05:03 by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Photo: Alfons / detikcom

Jakarta - The police have named 12 suspects related to Qnet investment. The mode used by Qnet to attract victims is the lure of a large bonus if it becomes a member. The Chairman of the Alert Investments Task Force Tongam L Tobing revealed before the Task Force had stopped marketing activities carried out by PT Amoeba International. "We have also called on Qnet at this November task force meeting to monitor the follow-up to the cessation of these activities," Tongam said when contacted by AFP on Thursday (11/07/2019). He explained, although Qnet activities were still stopped because the activities were actually legal because there is SIUPL, so products can be marketed with MLM systems. "But the activity was allegedly violating existing provisions and code of ethics," he explained. Previously the police from the Lumajang Police Precinct Police Cobra Team had searched the office of PT Amoeba Internasional in Kediri, East Java and QN Internasional Indonesia in Jakarta. QNII is the holder of the Qnet Indonesia brand. From the results of the QNII police inspection it does not have an exclusive distribution rights contract from the trademark owner. Though MLM companies should not be able to distribute products that do not have exclusive distribution contracts from brand owners. In addition, PT QNII's marketing is also not registered with the Ministry of Trade. QNII runs a distribution system with a solar model in which each member may have hundreds or even thousands of downliners and there are no restrictions at all to form the sun. But in fact, QNII runs a binary system where each member is only allowed to have 2 downliners namely 1 on the right foot and 1 on the left foot. This is called tricking the law, because what is reported is different from implementation in the field. It was also mentioned, victims began to fall from selling rice fields, cows to debt to the bank so that members could get a double bonus.
